name: Kent House
overview:
Kent House focuses on maximising return on investment from online channels.

Services include website design, web development, bespoke web application development, mobile apps, ecommerce, search engine marketing (SEO), email marketing, internet marketing, online collaboration and consultation tools, online polls and surveys, databases, intranets, extranets, content management, analytics, online adverstining management, pay per click advertising (PPC), Adwords, Adsense, and online helpdesks.

The company specialises in the UK NHS and health and social care sector, where it has particular market knowledge and expertise. Clients in this industry include the Department of Health, NHS Connecting for Health (CFH), primary care trusts (PCTs), strategic health authorities (SHAs), and UnitedHealth Europe.

Kent House offers products tailored specifically at supporting practice based commissioning (PBC). Their Insight product helps practices to monitor and manage outpatient referrals, attendances at A&E (unscheduled care) and emergency admissions. They also provide websites and support for practice based commissioning groups.

The company also provides EventManager - a software-as-a-service (SaaS) product - to help organisers of conferences and events to manage those events and to offer online registration.
